name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"03c111c5-0c1c-4f2e-9a22-51fa8414c389","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Group: Specialized Construct Handling","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5a39f1a7-6cc3-4703-9247-ee0b1cf9878a","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This group consists of high-level orchestration methods that manage the lifecycle of complex code structures. Unlike simple variables, constructs like functions and classes require the simultaneous creation of multiple related symbols (such as return values). These "handlers" ensure that whenever a new logical block is discovered, all the necessary infrastructure for that block is initialized correctly and consistently.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a7df8a8f-bc1b-4ae6-8686-53a035b9ba6a","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"a3a5907b-24b5-4d75-ac41-14ff4527c69c","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Methods","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"840344e4-02e9-4fa7-8d6f-efdf7f0c853d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"handle_function_def(parent_ns, fn_name)

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Manages the creation of a function entity.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"d16d3fd1-6c9b-4f81-b596-14a4b73ea5a8","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It generates the full namespace (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module.my_func","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1d452d35-2edc-4d4f-a67c-13ad93a6492e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It automatically creates a secondary definition for the function's return value (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module.my_func.return","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). This is vital for tracking data flow from a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"return","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" statement back to a caller.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1782d37e-a267-4176-a5b2-7e64aa443f27","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It resets or initializes decorator metadata, ensuring the analyzer starts with a clean state for function-level attributes.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"2c45f842-d3d6-4ffe-8215-ae72d1d5eeda","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"handle_class_def(parent_ns, cls_name, cls_ns)

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Manages the registration of a new class.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"9164c422-36ee-4b9b-9a51-06c8832fc886","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It ensures the entity is properly categorized as a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CLS_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6beb9db6-168e-4c9d-ad95-862f22268b4a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It handles the namespace resolution within the parent context, allowing the engine to track methods and attributes belonging specifically to that class.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"065f2a0d-7735-4de6-870e-f226d92f7ecd","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"handle_if_def(parent_ns, if_name, def_type=utils.constants.IF_DEF)

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Registers definitions for control-flow scopes.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"4dc04af7-53f9-4cf0-9aa6-9356c63b642f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"While "if" or "while" blocks aren't variables, the analyzer treats them as scopes to track the localized changes that occur within them.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"01a00a3b-5ec4-4b4e-ac44-eac1be2e4b4f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This method provides a mechanism to register ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"IF_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ELSE_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"WHILE_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" entities, which are then used by the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to group deferred updates.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"a5bb0dbb-de8b-408d-81e1-c7cb1af67496","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"f7384fca-254c-49d2-b9e8-607354bc05b7","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"aea9a0f2-4cda-40cc-ad00-c91302e5acc9","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The analyzer invokes these handlers as it walks the Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) of a source file.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"695acd8e-e005-46dc-bdc3-49092b08a6f3","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"# Analyzing: 
# def calculate(x):
#     return x * 2

# 1. Register the function and its return definition automatically
func_defi = dm.handle_function_def("math_module", "calculate")

# Verify the return definition was also created
return_defi = dm.get("math_module.calculate.return")
if return_defi:
    print("Return path initialized for 'calculate'.")

# 2. Register an 'if' block scope at line 20
if_scope = dm.handle_if_def("math_module.calculate", "if_20")","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"249c3a36-1648-4ca0-a48e-d72e32356edd","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Insights","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b31b2f7a-dd81-4f69-9ea2-b760138a2fc2","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Automatic Return Tracking","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"handle_function_def","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method solves a major coordination problem by ensuring that every function always has a dedicated "return" namespace. This allows return values to be treated as definitions themselves.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b96bf92a-3040-483f-b092-864877db90b3","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Categorization","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": By providing specific handlers for classes and control-flow, the manager helps the engine maintain the hierarchical nature of the code, making it easier to resolve "parent-child" relationships between modules, classes, and methods.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a35a6fe2-6d79-4942-ad29-0070ca6e730f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Idempotent Updates","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": These handlers safely check for existing definitions; if a function has already been registered (perhaps due to a previous pass), the handler simply refreshes its type and metadata rather than creating a duplicate.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d7638040-2b85-4940-9366-62d8c950e216","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
